FuncDef: This command configures a 10 Gb/s interface to be in Local or Wide Area Network (LAN or WAN) mode. When configuring the port to be in WAN mode, you can change certain SONET/SDH parameters to reflect the SONET/SDH requirements for this port. When you configure a port for LAN mode, all SONET/SDH parameters are pre-determined and not configurable.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the port to operate in LAN mode.
Sets the port to operate in WAN mode.
